Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: Stakeholders are keeping the pressure on the Albanese Government to take necessary actions in the upcoming budget and the Economic Inclusion Committee's recommendations are being closely considered. Posts are urging leaders to raise the rate of JobSeeker and related payments to help people cover essentials and address poverty. They are also recognizing the work of auditors who ensure taxpayers' money is being appropriately utilized. The government has an opportunity to make significant improvements and people are hopeful it'll be done.
